title: The Erotic Intoxication: Bad Girls
description: Vera Roberts presents a collection of erotic short stories to tantalize and keep you hot and sizzling during this Winter 2010. From naughty wives to bad and horny single women, The Erotic Intoxication will leave you breathless and wanting more...The Voyeur, Haya Gets a Lap Dance, Sex Therapy,Hot for Teacher, The Devil in Mrs. Jones (The Preacher's Wife)
author: Vera Roberts
